page.shortlink: api objects security object add user to roles method
page.description: Adds a user to the supplied roles
page.prototype: Context.Security.AddUserToRoles as L (UserName as C, RoleName as C)

argument.name: RoleNames
argument.description: The names of the roles to which the user will be added. Role names are separated by crlf.

return.name: result
return.description: Returns .T. if the role was added; otherwise .F.

page.discussion: Context.Security.AddUserToRoles() adds a user to the supplied roles. Check *[link:Context.Security.CallResult.Success@./index.xml#section1_CallResult]* before using the return value.
